4 minutes.

When the Jane tells another person, two people know the message (and 1 minute passed).
Now two people can tell two other people at the same time the new number, so that four people know the message (and 2 minutes passed).
Now that four people will tell other four people (and 3 minutes passed).
The next minute, everybody will have the new number.
The archer shot the arrow into the tree then painted the target around it.

To measure half an hour, you could light a stick from both sides: it would completely burn off in 30 minutes

To measure 45 minutes instead, you could light a stick from both sides and light the other stick from 1 side.
After the first stick completely burns, half an hour has passed. Then you could light the other burning stick from the other side, and it will burn completely in another 15 minutes.

Pour medicine into the 5 and 11 oz. cups until both are full, then pour the remaining 8 oz. in the bottle into the 13 oz. cup.
 Empty both the 5 and 11 oz. cups back into the bottle and transfer the medicine in the 13 oz. cup into the 11 oz. cup.
Pour 13 out of the 16 oz. in the bottle into the 13 oz. cup.

Pour 5 oz. of the 13 oz. cup into the 5 oz. cup.
Now pour the 5 oz. in the 5 oz. cup back into the 24 oz. bottle.
You now have 8 oz. in the 24 oz. bottle, the 11 oz. cup, and the 13 oz. cup, while the 5 oz. cup is empty.

Both 200 pound guys cross the river while the 400 pound guy stays.
Then one of the 2oo pound guys comes back with the boat and gives it to his 400 pound friend.
He gets across the river and gives the boat to the 200 pounds guy waiting on the shore.
Finally, the two 200 pounds guys cross the river together.

First 2 digits are the product of 1st and 2nd elements of the sum.
Next 2 digits are the product of 1st and 3rd elements of the sum.
Last two digits are the sum of the two previous multiplications, minus the 2nd element.

You take 6 random weights and put three on each side of the scale.
If they stay the same you know that the lightest one isn't in the batch, so you have 2 weights left: weight them and the one that goes up is the lightest.

If one of the plates goes down instead, put those three weights apart, the lightest is on the plate going up.
Take those three weights and weight two of them: if they are the same, the lightest is the third one, else it is the one on the plate going up.

Each Cow has 2 eyes and 4 legs and each bird has 2 eyes and 2 legs.
Lets call each eye as x and each leg as y, also each bird is n and each cow is m so:


n(2x+2y) + m(2x + 4y) = 172x + 344y
Solving the equation we have n = 0.

4 hours 43 minutes and 17 seconds.

In an hour, each tap fills 1/48, 1/72, 1/96 and 1/6.

So, in one hour the pool will be 61/288 full and it will be completely full in 288/61 hours, i.e. 4 hours 43 minutes and 17 seconds.

 If the donkey is brown, then every one is right: this is not the answer.

Therefore, the donkey is gray.

1)8 Minutes, because each monkey takes 8 minutes to eat a banana.\n\n8 Monkey: a monkey eats a banana in 8 minutes, then it will eat 6 bananas in 48 minutes. We need therefore 8 monkey to eat 48 bananas in that amount of time.

133.33 miles.

When the fly lands on the first cyclist, they are 50 miles apart.
The fly has then to travel (50 + x) miles at 16 miles/hour, in order to get to the second cyclist, where x is the additional distance between the two bikers, growing at the speed of 10 miles/hour.

In equations:
y = 50 + x (distance)
(50 + x)/16 = x/10 (time)
Yes, it is.

99.

She is the 50th better athlete: this means there are 49 students better than her.
She is also the 50th worst athlete: this means there are 49 students worse than her.
49(better) + 49(worse) + 1(Sue) = 99

First, fill the three gallon bucket with water and empty into the five gallon bucket.

Second, fill the three gallon bucket with water again and top off the five gallon bucket, leaving one gallon left in the three gallon bucket.

Third, empty the FIVE gallon bucket and pour the remaining one gallon of water from the three gallon bucket into the five gallon bucket.
Finally, fill the three gallon bucket and pour the water into the five gallon bucket.

As a result, you should have four gallons of water in the five gallon bucket.

38272416.

ABC represent the numbers 1, 2 and 3: multiply them together and you get 6.
FGH represents 6, 7 and 8: multiply them to get the next step: 336.
CCFCCGCCH represents 336, 337 and 338. Multiply them to get the answer: 38272416.

The message says:
'We will attack tomorrow'

It has been encoded using a Caesar Cipher: each letter has been shifted by 8 places in the alphabet.
A has been substituted by I, B by J, C by K etc.

15 hours.

In fact, when Mike wakes up, it is 9:00 P.M.: two hours later would make it 11:00 P.M., with one hour to midnight, and one hour later would make it 10:00 P.M., with two hours to midnight.
Mike has been sleeping since 6.00 A.M., so he has been asleep for 15 hours.
